|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This device may have a GbE WAN, 1x GbE and 3x FE LAN port.. The default SSID format may be the standard ''[[2Wire]]'' format - ''2WIRE'' followed by the last three digits of the gateway S/N.. but the manual sample value follows a format of ''2Wire-XXX'' This router would appears to have used with ''SingTel'''s broadband service. SSID format w/ ''SingTel'''s routers may follow the format of '''SINGTEL-XXXX'''. ===System Information=== * Manufacturer: [[2Wire]] * Model: 5012NV-002 * Serial Number: 09111A0210XX (last 2 digits obfuscated) * Hardware Version: 2701-000808-004 * Software Version: 9.3.1.25 (may not be current version) * Key Code: 52AD-2AD4-6266-22NA-B27M * First Use Date: 2011 -04-12T07:39:29-08:00 * DSL Modem A2pC030g.d22k * System Password: None ===Chipset markings=== {{SCollapse|Chipsets |
